involving or expressed in numbers: a numerical calculation numerical skill/ability Keep your files in numerical order. The UN forces have a numerical superiority over the rebels (= there are more of the UN forces).

involving or shown by a series of numbers: The phone's voice-recognition system converts the sound into numerical data. The site gives numerical ratings for lawyers to help consumers searching for legal advice. He applies good numerical reasoning skills to data. numerically adverb uk/njuːˈmerɪkli/ us/nuːˈmerɪkli/
The risks involved can then be ranked numerically.
